repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu:18.04

RUN apt-get update && apt-get -y dist-upgrade && \
    apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y lib32z1 xinetd && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

RUN useradd -m ctf

RUN apt-get -y --no-install-recommends install python3 && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
RUN apt-get -y --no-install-recommends install python3-pip && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

RUN pip3 install --no-cache-dir --upgrade pip -i  https://pypi.douban.com/simple
RUN pip3 install --no-cache-dir tensorflow==2.3.0

WORKDIR /home/ctf

RUN cp -R /lib* /home/ctf && \
    cp -R /usr/lib* /home/ctf

RUN mkdir /home/ctf/dev && \
    mknod /home/ctf/dev/null c 1 3 && \
    mknod /home/ctf/dev/zero c 1 5 && \
    mknod /home/ctf/dev/random c 1 8 && \
    mknod /home/ctf/dev/urandom c 1 9 && \
    chmod 666 /home/ctf/dev/*

RUN mkdir /home/ctf/bin && \
    cp /bin/sh /home/ctf/bin && \
    cp /usr/bin/python3 /home/ctf/bin && \
    cp /usr/bin/python3 /home/ctf/ && \
    cp /bin/ls /home/ctf/bin && \
    cp /bin/cat /home/ctf/bin

COPY ./ctf.xinetd /etc/xinetd.d/ctf
COPY ./start.sh /start.sh
RUN echo "Blocked by ctf_xinetd" > /etc/banner_fail

RUN chmod +x /start.sh

COPY ./bin/ /home/ctf/
RUN chown -R root:ctf /home/ctf && \
    chmod -R 750 /home/ctf && \
    chmod 740 /home/ctf/flag

CMD ["/start.sh"]

EXPOSE 8081
